TEXT.S:
mibihkac 1 00:00:04,366 --> 00:00:10,366 i ayaw kasumamadan sa miadup kamu? i buyu' isaw miadup ?
2 00:00:10,366 --> 00:00:17,966 miadup, nayi' ku aadupen uyni sa u pibihkac ku izaay yu
3 00:00:18,033 --> 00:00:26,733 tayni kulesuk nu ayam u tababakiyay sa u tubiyak tubikak
4 00:00:26,866 --> 00:00:33,366 uay u taduk munabuy tini nipalumaan tu kalitang tubiyak
5 00:00:33,466 --> 00:00:42,700 ya tubiyak hananay a ayam u tubiyak uynian u lilip hananay tubuyak tubiyak lilip
6 00:00:42,800 --> 00:00:49,733 matineng kisu tu lilip hananay adidi' kiyam hawsa asu' kiyami kya lilip lilip lilip
7 00:00:49,800 --> 00:00:56,100 u sisal han nu Pangcah u lilip han nu Sakizaya asu' kiya hiya sisil lilip
8 00:00:56,166 --> 00:00:59,066 hicaen namu miadup
9 00:00:59,166 --> 00:01:07,066 bihkac u salil ku zuma u bikac ku zuma na itini i buyu'
10 00:01:07,233 --> 00:01:13,000 izaw ku ya tikulac talakalen kuyza tikulac
11 00:01:13,000 --> 00:01:19,533 u tengil isu tu kungku isu haw, nu mahiniay alikakay tadatada sanay ,alikakay tadatada
12 00:01:19,566 --> 00:01:21,833 u kungku nu babalaki
13 00:01:21,833 --> 00:01:25,133 sakamuwamay
14 00:01:25,366 --> 00:01:29,466 u katengilan tu kungku nu babalaki aku sa
15 00:01:29,533 --> 00:01:34,200 ci Butung hananay sa
16 00:01:34,233 --> 00:01:44,066 ci Butung hananay sa mikadabu tiya niyazu'an
17 00:01:44,333 --> 00:01:49,933 mahiza maluk patadas hena tu buyu' kiyami haw sa
18 00:01:49,966 --> 00:01:54,666 kunikaluk nu babalaki yu mahidanay patadas tu nu buyu
19 00:01:54,800 --> 00:02:00,800 melaw hantu ci Butung sa sademiad sa i luma' sa
20 00:02:01,000 --> 00:02:04,033 musanga' tu culen ya culen hananay
21 00:02:04,166 --> 00:02:06,700 matineng kamu haw?
22 00:02:06,700 --> 00:02:13,666 wayaan tu taumah mitadas tuyni u babulesakan
23 00:02:13,666 --> 00:02:17,900 tuynian u tipustipus u panaypanay sa ku babalaki
24 00:02:18,166 --> 00:02:23,300 aycansaw caay kademec ci Butung misamga' tu culen sa
25 00:02:23,466 --> 00:02:29,966 ci Butung ahebal tu ku nu tau nipatadasan tuya buyu'
26 00:02:30,166 --> 00:02:37,933 papalumaan tu tamulak palumaan tu tipus
27 00:02:38,033 --> 00:02:44,500 melaw han ci Butung sa i luma', matatungus tu Sakizaya i
28 00:02:44,900 --> 00:02:54,533 ci Butung sa tahkal satu ci Butung sa miawi tya culen sa
29 00:02:55,200 --> 00:02:56,400 tatenga'
30 00:02:57,200 --> 00:03:04,900 sulsulen hantu niya sulsulen ni Butung kya culen
31 00:03:04,900 --> 00:03:11,800 i cebecebedan i buyu' mahamin sa mabelbel kya lutuk
32 00:03:11,800 --> 00:03:16,400 amalahica tu ku nu tau nipatadas niza tuwaca ku a hebalay sa ,
33 00:03:17,000 --> 00:03:21,766 mahini kya kungku niya babalaki ci Butungan
34 00:03:22,933 --> 00:03:28,333 tumahiza satu sa izaw ku limulak nu niyazu'
35 00:03:28,600 --> 00:03:33,600 amibuting kya Malungayangay hanay sa papubu ku tau
36 00:03:33,600 --> 00:03:41,066 i nananuman ku tau papubu sa ci Butung sa i lututukan
37 00:03:41,266 --> 00:03:47,600 mahiza sudakhan kya pubu ni Butung matumes nu buting
38 00:03:47,733 --> 00:03:51,066 inananumay nu nipapuban nu tau
39 00:03:51,266 --> 00:03:54,633 icaawa tulutul kiya buting i labu sa
40 00:03:54,633 --> 00:03:56,933 mahiniay ku kungku nu babalaki
41 00:03:57,066 --> 00:04:05,866 simsimen nu mita ci Butung hananay nau kungku nu babalaaki
42 00:04:06,066 --> 00:04:08,766 manay maluk ku babalaki kiyam taumah
43 00:04:08,766 --> 00:04:14,333 kuynian u tatayna sa aminiwaniw kya isaw
44 00:04:14,400 --> 00:04:22,033 miapa han tu ku balakiay tu a wawa mahiza sa
45 00:04:22,166 --> 00:04:27,533 katukuhan tu ku pacucuan niya niyamiapaay
46 00:04:27,633 --> 00:04:31,866 tayza sa i winaan pacucu sa mahiza u makemetay
47 00:04:31,966 --> 00:04:36,766 buhat han sa mabetas tu kuyni u bili sa
48 00:04:36,866 --> 00:04:43,766 kaen niya alikakay kuyni u bili ya alikakay
49 00:04:43,866 --> 00:04:49,733 anu mahica ku wina sa mahiza ya pising niya siwawaay
50 00:04:49,733 --> 00:04:58,700 yapising niya alikakay mahini kya lalikakay hananay u kungku nu babalaki
51 00:04:58,700 --> 00:05:00,966 wyzasa tu imelangi
52 00:05:00,966 --> 00:05:09,833 anu kasumamadan sa izaw ku ising haw? anu imelangi kitani hicahan? ??
53 00:05:11,166 --> 00:05:16,900 imelang anu imelang izaw kya si Di'tuay hananay
54 00:05:18,033 --> 00:05:22,933 u kamu nu Pangcah u sikawasay hananay kiyam sikawasay
55 00:05:23,400 --> 00:05:28,500 matakus tu mahizaay ii
56 00:05:28,500 --> 00:05:36,600 imelang sa yu adada ku bili sa mitakus tu mahizaay u siDi'tuay
57 00:05:36,700 --> 00:05:40,800 sikawasay hananay pasanga'
58 00:05:40,966 --> 00:05:44,833 kinapina hen kaku yu hiyaen nu babalaki
59 00:05:44,833 --> 00:05:52,533 takusen ku yu siDi'tuay hananay amisanga' itakuwan
60 00:05:52,533 --> 00:05:54,900 kapah tu? ?
61 00:05:55,000 --> 00:06:03,733 u balucu' ita sa kapah tu isaw sa sawni tahkal ahica saw
62 00:06:05,833 --> 00:06:12,866 u balucu' ita ku manamuh ku balucu' ita kyam haw mang'aay
63 00:06:13,033 --> 00:06:22,400 manga'ay nuyza tahkal aca yu nayi' tu mahiza ku nu babalakinay
64 00:06:22,566 --> 00:06:29,033 ucansaw ku sapaising nayi' ku sapaising nayi' naicuway ku paysu'
65 00:06:29,033 --> 00:06:38,300 paungan tu nu tademaw miala tu patayza ayza i buyubuyu'an
66 00:06:38,400 --> 00:06:43,066 lalimenah kuyda
67 00:06:43,100 --> 00:06:48,200 tateng' yu imelang kita kyami
68 00:06:48,400 --> 00:06:51,533 i sumamaday kuyni asausi
69 00:06:51,666 --> 00:06:56,366 u babalaki yu mayza a mabi i kakabian sa
70 00:06:56,466 --> 00:07:02,533 tayni ku lalimenah sa u adididi' sakiyami
71 00:07:02,733 --> 00:07:11,333 lilid han tu kya ta patayzan i iluc nu yu bitunay iluc nu da'dac sa
72 00:07:11,466 --> 00:07:16,866 ku nu tu tademaw pazeng sa mahini ku sausi i sumamad
73 00:07:17,066 --> 00:07:20,900 izaw kya mahizaay lalimela hananay
74 00:07:20,966 --> 00:07:28,300 i iluc nu hacica ku takalaw pazengan i pabaw sa
75 00:07:28,633 --> 00:07:37,033 liliden niya lalimenahay i iluc nu bitunay
76 00:07:37,266 --> 00:07:42,600 haycan tu nu cekak tuya bitunay a auk
77 00:07:42,900 --> 00:07:48,333 padengen i iluc nu bitunay ahicaen budebu
78 00:07:48,500 --> 00:07:55,800 mahiza kya kahiza niya lalimenah sa
79 00:07:56,033 --> 00:07:59,133 hang sakamumay
80 00:07:59,233 --> 00:08:02,566 ucanan ku wantan nikanan nu uzip sa
81 00:08:02,766 --> 00:08:08,666 anu kamu itini pimelaw aku tu cudad kyam haw
82 00:08:09,066 --> 00:08:16,600 u ya katanaya' nu uzip nu mita sa unyni u ngayay amin ku kawaw
83 00:08:16,766 --> 00:08:22,266 kaisa tu la'cusay a kawaw
84 00:08:22,366 --> 00:08:26,466 sakatanaya' nu nikauzip sa
85 00:08:26,566 --> 00:08:33,533 ucanan ku kaen a sizuma sa ku kaen u tubah ku kanen i
86 00:08:33,666 --> 00:08:42,200 au tubah ku kanena tanaya' ku uzip
87 00:08:42,466 --> 00:09:01,533 u tademaw mitengilay aucanan ku kaen isu maila sanay
88 00:09:01,666 --> 00:09:05,500 uycanan ku kanen malecalecad tu
89 00:09:05,500 --> 00:09:26,366 sakalanam asiduma sa nicakayan nu adiwawa sakalanam
90 00:09:26,466 --> 00:09:30,133 u tawling
91 00:09:30,666 --> 00:09:35,000 kana cecaceca kaku tu mahidaay
92 00:09:35,233 --> 00:09:48,566 cacay a demuad kinapina mienip, anu tau sa inaayaw tusatusa ku mahinian alesa tu ,
93 00:09:48,700 --> 00:09:55,900 tanu tuluhu' sa kiyami haw alesan tu aku
94 00:09:56,133 --> 00:10:03,533 saayaway miales kaku sa sadumiad sa adada ku tangah
95 00:10:03,733 --> 00:10:10,800 maliyuh tabakuen
96 00:10:10,900 --> 00:10:14,333 sawni paisingen nu wawa
97 00:10:14,366 --> 00:10:16,833 sawni paisingen nu wawa
98 00:10:16,933 --> 00:10:20,833 adada' ku tangah namiales kaku tu tabaku
99 00:10:21,100 --> 00:10:26,266 u kinatusa aku kuyni ayda
100 00:10:26,400 --> 00:10:34,733 manay tu nu tuluhu' sakita tanamennay nu mita , 101 00:10:34,733 --> 00:10:39,066 miales adada hena kina tangal
102 00:10:39,266 --> 00:10:42,066 ahica kya miales sanay kaku sa
103 00:10:42,100 --> 00:10:46,900 tanamen aku sakana tusa mitanam miales ales han naku sa ,
104 00:10:47,066 --> 00:10:55,100 mihalhal kaku caay tu ka adada kina tangal aku sa cay satu ka adada
105 00:10:55,166 --> 00:11:00,166 caay tu pitabaku caay satu ka adada ku tangah
106 00:11:00,466 --> 00:11:04,533 aleales satu kaku ayza mitabaku
107 00:11:04,633 --> 00:11:16,033 nau mitabakuay kaku tahasandeb tulutulu i yu mahida mitabaku
108 00:11:16,266 --> 00:11:26,200 u paysu' ku han numita sa mikizay kita mihadidi' kita mitabaku
109 00:11:26,466 --> 00:11:32,900 anu paydang han nu mita kunikangalay mitabaku tutulu a tabu
110 00:11:33,700 --> 00:11:41,666 mahiza ku tabaku nay u da'dac nay u pah nay yu sumamad
111 00:11:42,100 --> 00:11:47,500 bai naimelang kisu kaw, naadi'di katuku ayza, naimelang haw? ?
112 00:11:48,066 --> 00:11:51,933 tabakiay aku a imelang haw
113 00:11:52,100 --> 00:11:54,266 nasisasumidang kaku i Pukpuk
114 00:11:54,433 --> 00:11:59,033 tatayna sa ci Bunuk ku ngangan niya tatayna Bunuk
115 00:11:59,133 --> 00:12:05,400 namahiza satu sa namalahita kaku tu nu Hulam kiyami
116 00:12:05,533 --> 00:12:06,700 mademec ku Lipud sa
117 00:12:06,800 --> 00:12:11,866 malahitay kaku tu nu Hulam misebeng tuya fay-ci-cang
118 00:12:12,033 --> 00:12:13,700 yala i pukpuk kiyam haw
119 00:12:13,766 --> 00:12:17,333 u misebengay kaku itila ya fay-ci-cang
120 00:12:17,566 --> 00:12:24,366 manay itini sa kaku i Pupuk midang i tu tatayna
121 00:12:25,033 --> 00:12:30,233 kaku itawya ziwkiwsay kaku itawya kaku itawya 19
122 00:12:30,233 --> 00:12:39,066 tangasa itawya sa izaw ku libung ita itini izaw ku libu hananay a imelang
123 00:12:39,066 --> 00:12:47,533 tidintu hananay kiyami mahiza u tabilas ku pising
124 00:12:47,533 --> 00:13:09,700 mahiza hansa maala niya libung ciyama aku itawya sa
125 00:13:10,366 --> 00:13:13,966 taluma'ales satu kaku itiza mikuli i
126 00:13:13,966 --> 00:13:23,333 tamahiza sa, awiyca miales tuna babalaki
127 00:13:23,333 --> 00:13:29,466 mangalay tu makadih tya mamidang yada i Pukpuk
128 00:13:29,466 --> 00:13:37,533 u imelang aku itawya kuyamaybiw tabaki ku imelang aku itawya
129 00:13:37,533 --> 00:13:45,066 misimsim tuya tataynaan mahiza ku satabakiay aku a imelang
130 00:13:45,066 --> 00:14:01,233 tengil sakaku sa iluma' mangalay kaku tayza tengil siacawa tu sa
131 00:14:01,233 --> 00:14:07,333 mangaleb ku imelang aku mahiniay kaku itawya
132 00:14:07,333 --> 00:14:19,133 papina ku sasumidang isu
133 00:14:19,133 --> 00:14:24,100 tayla tuyza a niyazu'an mangalay takuwan
134 00:14:24,133 --> 00:14:26,666 tayla tuyza a niyazu'an mangalay takuwan
135 00:14:27,133 --> 00:14:32,133 awican ku mahiniay amasausi caay ka sausi malakapah saisaw ,
136 00:14:32,733 --> 00:14:48,233 awican ku mahiniay amasausi caay ka sausi malakapah saisaw ,
Katangka a niyazu' u pipakanan niyam tu katalan 1 00:00:04,466 --> 00:00:10,266 yu sumamad sa natizaan ku pipakanan niyam tu katalan
2 00:00:10,800 --> 00:00:15,266 yu masa wawa nay kaku sa cecay nay bataan ku mihcaan 10
3 00:00:15,266 --> 00:00:18,166 sabaw tusa a mihca ku sasabaay 12
4 00:00:18,166 --> 00:00:21,133 u pikanan niyam kina hikuziw
5 00:00:22,400 --> 00:00:24,066 tumahiza sa
6 00:00:24,200 --> 00:00:30,933 nu saayaway tayni i hukuziw sa uyu tusaay sakubad a hikuki
7 00:00:31,100 --> 00:00:38,500 tusaay sakubad nu Lipunay a hikuki nu saayaway tayni itini
8 00:00:38,833 --> 00:00:46,933 caay nay kasanga' debu asanay i lutulutukan a hikuki mahizanay
9 00:00:49,133 --> 00:01:03,733 tunamahiza sa izaw tu ku kalisiw isaw nuyniay takalaway sa sanga' hantu i kina hikuziw
10 00:01:04,366 --> 00:01:13,100 misanga' tu sa namisucungiw tu kaku namicudad
11 00:01:13,633 --> 00:01:19,966 sabaw tu lima sabaw enem ku mihcaan aku tya masanga' 1516
12 00:01:20,033 --> 00:01:24,366 misanga' kangtang han i kuni pisanga' nu saayaway
13 00:01:24,533 --> 00:01:29,266 ayza sa sadimel han tu kina hikuziw ayza
14 00:01:29,333 --> 00:01:34,500 uyni ku sakauzip niyam u Hupu itini i Sanzisya hanay
15 00:01:34,566 --> 00:01:37,233 lakuan mala hikuziw tu ayza kiyam
16 00:01:38,166 --> 00:01:43,800 mala hikuziw tu uynian ku sakauzip nu niyazu'
17 00:01:44,600 --> 00:01:45,666 siumah
18 00:01:45,766 --> 00:01:47,700 u lakulakuan
19 00:01:47,833 --> 00:01:53,366 yunziw nansay kaku yunziw nansay 40
20 00:01:53,433 --> 00:02:00,733 malingatu balaki tuway kaku yunziw nansay tu kaku 40
21 00:02:01,033 --> 00:02:05,500 kahulaman nangning sa misausi nay kita
22 00:02:05,600 --> 00:02:08,766 mahidaay yunziw nansaya kaku sa 40
23 00:02:08,866 --> 00:02:12,633 pinaan tu a mihca yunziw naning tu 40
24 00:02:12,700 --> 00:02:20,066 50 nananing 50 do-nian tu kina hikuziw 5050
25 00:02:20,533 --> 00:02:23,266 iayw namibuting kamu baki haw ?
26 00:02:24,033 --> 00:02:26,766 mibuting, tabayu mibuting kami haw ?
27 00:02:27,166 --> 00:02:30,066 hang namibuting kami ,
28 00:02:30,133 --> 00:02:34,500 sikakelic kami tamitimu
29 00:02:34,866 --> 00:02:45,166 mamin maluk sa mamin tu miniwaniw tu tipus kiyami
30 00:02:45,166 --> 00:02:53,333 i 3 gace tahkal ku timu kiyam haw i bayu sa 3
31 00:02:54,100 --> 00:03:01,900 tayza sikakelic henay kami itawya sa mitimu kami i bayu
32 00:03:02,233 --> 00:03:12,200 sikakelic kaku ahicantu culil han ahicaen
33 00:03:12,466 --> 00:03:18,933 izaw ku nipatayni namaka tipay hananay
34 00:03:19,066 --> 00:03:22,933 i sehu haw izaw ku patayniay a auk sa
35 00:03:23,033 --> 00:03:26,333 wami tu ku misanga'ay
36 00:03:28,600 --> 00:03:34,566 izaw saw ku pasubana'ay a misanga' tya kakelic sasa
37 00:03:34,666 --> 00:03:40,133 matineng haw kami ahicaen ku pisanga' tu kakelic
38 00:03:40,200 --> 00:03:42,866 izaw ku pasubana'an nu Taywan sa
39 00:03:42,866 --> 00:03:49,066 u auk sa cakay sa kami wami tu ku misanga'ay tu kakelic
40 00:03:49,133 --> 00:03:58,233 anu tabayu sa pakelakela'en tu i pakelakela'en pataza i bayu
41 00:04:01,500 --> 00:04:04,133 mamin tu ku kawaw i laku sa
42 00:04:04,300 --> 00:04:12,600 tayzaay tu kami i tuluay a bulad hananay sa 3
43 00:04:12,633 --> 00:04:15,533 izaw tu ku tinghu itawya sa
44 00:04:15,533 --> 00:04:17,966 tayza tu mihmihcaan
45 00:04:18,066 --> 00:04:26,300 uyni nikaluk tya pibuting tuhiya hatiza i
46 00:04:26,366 --> 00:04:30,500 u hica ku sakauzip i sumamad
47 00:04:30,733 --> 00:04:32,633 masasumidang henay
48 00:04:32,700 --> 00:04:53,033 "uy yan oya oyan sa owa hayan ina luwan na iyenan u hay yan na lu wan hay yan".
49 00:04:53,633 --> 00:04:59,133 nukasiay a dadiw, aku kuayaw ,
50 00:04:59,133 --> 00:05:06,800 iayaw malipah kami u babalaki, izaw ku dadiw tanamoyu, pasumanaen kamu tanamoyu
51 00:05:06,800 --> 00:05:15,100 yu dadiw sa mapawan tu kaku tu dadiw nu mita
52 00:05:15,600 --> 00:05:19,800 u kiwkay tu ku dadiw nu mita kyami sa
53 00:05:19,900 --> 00:05:25,100 mapawan tu nu ayaway a dadiw
54 00:05:26,666 --> 00:05:30,166 dadiw sa nu kiwkay tu ku dadiw kiyami
55 00:05:30,233 --> 00:05:33,966 mapawan tu nu ayawayaway
56 00:05:33,966 --> 00:05:38,733 haw?maydih kaku mipalita tisuwan ama, iayaw kiyami haw? ,
57 00:05:38,733 --> 00:05:41,966 tatama ku mikadabuay u tatayna haw? ?
58 00:05:41,966 --> 00:05:52,233 mikadabu ku tatama i tatana cayay? hang sa mahicaay ku mahiniay cow-hung nu Hulam ,?
59 00:05:52,233 --> 00:05:56,133 haw siacawa tiniyay sa anmakasic kinatatama sa
60 00:05:56,133 --> 00:06:02,400 sibakah nu siluma'ay nu acawa ku zikuc i putah laliw han tu kinatatama sa kiyami
61 00:06:02,400 --> 00:06:04,133 ayaw nu kungku nu babalaki
62 00:06:04,166 --> 00:06:06,233 tatenga' izaw mahicaay a kawaw haw? ?
63 00:06:07,600 --> 00:06:11,700 hang, izaw tu ,
64 00:06:11,700 --> 00:06:16,900 tu nu wawa sakiyami anu sakakaay sa mahiniay a wam ,
65 00:06:16,900 --> 00:06:20,066 ma u ni sakatusa uzumaay a wawa sakiyami
66 00:06:20,066 --> 00:06:25,566 mahicaay ku bai niyam iayaw tunisiacawa sa ku bai niyam ,
67 00:06:25,566 --> 00:06:29,266 izaw ku mahiniay i Hupu haw? ?
68 00:06:29,266 --> 00:06:32,300 izaw mahiniay ku kawaw iayaw a kawaw micadabu tatama kiyami ?
69 00:06:32,300 --> 00:06:40,900 sa hicasa niza mitapid nu timul ku mahiniay u mitapid
70 00:06:40,900 --> 00:06:46,033 mahiniay u anu maydih kiya tatayna sa a pakasuyen nisu cayay? ,
71 00:06:46,033 --> 00:06:48,466 izaw ku mahiniay a kawaw ?
72 00:06:48,833 --> 00:06:52,566 yu maydih ciniza tya tatayna haw
73 00:06:52,733 --> 00:06:56,166 pakasuy isaw miala tu kasuy saw?
74 00:06:56,433 --> 00:07:00,733 miladun mahida ku babalaki sumamad ,
75 00:07:00,733 --> 00:07:03,266 sakamuwamay maydih mitengil ,
76 00:07:03,266 --> 00:07:08,566 yu maydih ciniza tya tatayna haw
77 00:07:08,600 --> 00:07:13,933 saayaway hida sa malepadang tu labu nu luma' isaw
78 00:07:13,933 --> 00:07:21,666 manamuh kya babalaki sa, mahiza sa u canan ku kasiacawa nu mita sa 79 00:07:21,666 --> 00:07:27,766 meduk satu malatal tu sananal mikasuy tu i buyu'
80 00:07:27,766 --> 00:07:38,600 anu kinatulu ciniza mikasuy pataluma'
81 00:07:38,600 --> 00:07:47,466 pacangzay tu kasuy pipazengan tu kasuy, izaw ku pisanga' tu mahizaay ,
82 00:07:47,733 --> 00:07:51,033 u kasuy ku sapikadabu i
83 00:07:51,333 --> 00:08:00,166 kinaayaw u tatama ku mikadabuay caay ku tatayna
84 00:08:04,133 --> 00:08:08,833 u kasatiman nu babalaki itawya
85 00:08:09,100 --> 00:08:11,233 caay ka icelang kiyam
86 00:08:11,366 --> 00:08:17,666 anu mikadabu a sawacu han ciniza sanay ku babalak
87 00:08:18,800 --> 00:08:21,100 caay papikadabu tu tatayna
88 00:08:21,466 --> 00:08:25,433 u tatama ku papikadabuen icelang kiyami ku tatama ,
89 00:08:25,633 --> 00:08:29,100 caay kasawacuen nu tau ku tatama
90 00:08:29,266 --> 00:08:36,700 u tatayna sa kadihian nu babalaki i sumamad
91 00:08:37,033 --> 00:08:47,366 manay caay papikadabu i u cacabuan tatama mahizaay

96 00:09:14,366 --> 00:09:31,400 kay lalabu nina tebun yunziwsyaku yunziwnisyaku hatini kyami 4042
97 00:09:31,700 --> 00:09:35,933 itini misatebun kami tya misamga' tu kya Lipun
98 00:09:35,966 --> 00:10:02,266 namaka buyu' patayza tya tangku niya hasisiw hang
99 00:10:02,266 --> 00:10:10,700 i tiza mihiya kiyami milatun miala tu nanum
100 00:10:10,966 --> 00:10:17,166 hang, itini sa tagesul sa mapeci' ku patang milacul
101 00:10:17,566 --> 00:10:33,500 mapeci sa' ahicantu u patang ku sapihiya
102 00:10:33,733 --> 00:10:45,666 itini isaw katuud ku tademaw kiyami haw sawni la'cus sawni la'cus satuwa satu patang

104 00:10:54,966 --> 00:11:01,600 ku kamu sa abesa ku nu namu sa

113 00:11:55,100 --> 00:11:58,566 sedak caykasa kina niyazu'
114 00:11:58,733 --> 00:12:07,666 u malaupu tayni nu tebutebusan u cebedcebedan namin kuyni tiniay kiyamin haw
115 00:12:07,833 --> 00:12:13,066 mipatadas misalaku misalaku nu Lipun

117 00:12:17,900 --> 00:12:27,133 manay u Sakizaya ku kamu nu itiniay i sumamad, ayza tu masumad tu

125 00:13:16,566 --> 00:13:25,166 nu kamu uyza u Tingsukiw u tingsukiw naadidi'
